TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi FileListBox extends System.Windows.Forms.ListBox

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

summary.span: 查找并列出在运行时由 属性指定的目录中的文件。

span.span: Locates and lists files in the directory specified by the property at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此控件显示按文件类型选择的文件的列表。Use this control to display a list of files selected by file type. 例如，可以在应用程序中创建对话框，使用户能够选择文件或文件组。You can create dialog boxes in your application that, for example, enable the user to select a file or group of files. 如果还显示 和 控件，则可以编写代码以将它们与 `FileListBox` 控件和其他控件进行同步。If you also display the and controls, you can write code to synchronize them with the `FileListBox` control and with each other. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

related.span: SaveFileDialog 组件概述（Windows 窗体）
OpenFileDialog 组件概述（Windows 窗体）

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileListBox` 在运行时显示给定目录中的文件的列表。A `FileListBox` displays a list of files in a given directory at run time. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可以指定要在 控件中显示的文件类型，该类型基于操作环境中使用的标准 `Archive` 文件属性。Use this property to specify the type of files to display in a control, based on standard `Archive` file attribute used in the operating environment. 在代码中在运行时设置此属性会将 控件重置为仅显示具有指定属性的那些文件。Setting this property in code at run time resets the control to display only those files that have the specified attribute. MemberSignature.Value: .method familynewslot virtual instance void OnDoubleClick(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnDoubleClick (e As EventArgs)
.method familyvirtual instance void OnDoubleClick(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnDoubleClick (e As EventArgs)
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnDoubleClick(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 利用 `OnDoubleClick` 方法，派生类还可以处理事件，而无需附加委托。The `OnDoubleClick` method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

related.span: SaveFileDialog 组件概述（Windows 窗体）
OpenFileDialog 组件概述（Windows 窗体）

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Path { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Path : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置 的当前路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the current path for a .

value.span: 一个 ，包含当前路径，但不包括文件名。

span.span: A that contains the current path, not including the file name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Path` 属性的值是一个字符串，指示路径，例如 C:\Ob 或 C:\Windows\System。The value of the `Path` property is a string indicating a path, such as C:\Ob or C:\Windows\System. 对于 控件，当在运行时创建控件时，默认值为当前路径。For a control, the default is the current path when the control is created at run time. 在生成应用程序的文件浏览和操作功能时使用此属性。Use this property when you are building an application's file-browsing and manipulation capabilities. 设置 `Path` 属性的效果类似于 MS-DOS `chdir` 命令;使用或不使用驱动器规范时允许使用相对路径。Setting the `Path` property has effects similar to the MS-DOS `chdir` command; relative paths are allowed with or without a drive specification. 仅指定带有冒号的驱动器（:)选择该驱动器上的当前目录。Specifying only a drive with a colon (:) selects the current directory on that drive. 使用以下语法，还可以将 `Path` 属性设置为无驱动器连接的合格网络路径：The `Path` property can also be set to a qualified network path without a drive connection using the following syntax: ``` \\servername\sharename\path ``` 更改 控件的 `Path` 的值会生成 事件。Changing the value of `Path` for a control generates an event. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

related.span: SaveFileDialog 组件概述（Windows 窗体）
OpenFileDialog 组件概述（Windows 窗体）

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PathChange As EventHandler

summary.span: 在代码中设置 或 属性以更改路径时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the path is changed by setting the or property in code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 `PathChange` 事件过程来响应 控件中的路径更改。You can use a `PathChange` event procedure to respond to path changes in a control. 如果将包含新路径的字符串分配到 属性，则 控件将调用 `PathChange` 事件。When you assign a string that contains a new path to the property, the control invokes the `PathChange` event. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

related.span: SaveFileDialog 组件概述（Windows 窗体）
OpenFileDialog 组件概述（Windows 窗体）

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Pattern { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Pattern : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示运行时在 控件中显示的文件名。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the file names displayed in a control at run time.

value.span: 指示文件规范的字符串表达式，如 "\*。\*"或"\*。INLINE.FRM "。

span.span: A string expression indicating a file specification, such as "\*.\*" or "\*.FRM".

value.span: 默认值为 "\*。\*"，它将返回所有文件的列表。

span.span: The default is "\*.\*", which returns a list of all files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Pattern` 属性在设计应用程序的文件浏览和操作功能方面起着重要作用。The `Pattern` property plays a key role in designing an application's file-browsing and manipulation capabilities. 将 `Pattern` 与其他文件控制属性结合使用，为用户提供浏览文件或类似文件组的方式。Use `Pattern` in combination with other file-control properties to give the user ways to explore files or groups of similar files. 例如，在专门用于启动其他程序的应用程序中，你可以指定仅 .exe 文件显示在文件列表框（\* .exe）中。For example, in an application dedicated to starting other programs, you could designate that only .exe files be displayed in the file list box (\*.exe). 除了使用通配符以外，还可以使用用分号（;) 分隔的多种模式。In addition to using wildcard characters, you can also use multiple patterns separated by semicolons (;). 例如，"\* .exe;\* .bat "将返回所有可执行文件和所有 MS-DOS 批处理文件的列表。For example, "\*.exe; \*.bat" would return a list of all executable files and all MS-DOS batch files. 更改 `Pattern` 属性的值会生成 事件。Changing the value of the `Pattern` property generates a event. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

related.span: SaveFileDialog 组件概述（Windows 窗体）
OpenFileDialog 组件概述（Windows 窗体）

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PatternChange As EventHandler

summary.span: 在代码中设置 或 属性以更改文件列表模式（如“\*.\*”）时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the file listing pattern, such as "\*.\*", is changed by setting the or property in code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 `PatternChange` 事件过程来响应 控件中的模式更改。You can use a `PatternChange` event procedure to respond to pattern changes in a control. 将包含新模式的字符串分配到 属性时，FileListBox 将调用 事件。When you assign a string that contains a new pattern to the property, the FileListBox invokes the event. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

related.span: SaveFileDialog 组件概述（Windows 窗体）
OpenFileDialog 组件概述（Windows 窗体）

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ReadOnly { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ReadOnly : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定 控件是否包含具有只读特性的文件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether a control contains files that have read-only attributes.

value.span: 如果将显示具有 特性的文件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if files that have the attribute will be displayed; otherwise .

value.span: 默认为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 控件的 `ReadOnly` 属性来指定是否在文件列表中显示具有只读属性的文件。Use the `ReadOnly` property for a control to specify whether files that have read-only attributes are displayed in the file list or not. > [!NOTE] > 如果 属性设置为 `true` （默认值），则将显示具有只读属性的文件，而不考虑 `ReadOnly` 属性设置。If the property is set to `true` (the default), files that have read-only attributes are displayed regardless of the `ReadOnly` property setting. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

related.span: SaveFileDialog 组件概述（Windows 窗体）
OpenFileDialog 组件概述（Windows 窗体）

MemberSignature.Value: .method public virtual instance void Refresh() cil managed
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Refresh() cil managed

summary.span: 强制控件使其工作区无效并立即重绘自己。

span.span: Forces the control to invalidate its client area and immediately redraw itself.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，请确保调用基类的 方法，以便使控件及其子控件无效并重新绘制。

span.span: When you override in a derived class, make sure to call the method of the base class so the control and its child controls are invalidated and redrawn.

related.span: SaveFileDialog 组件概述（Windows 窗体）
OpenFileDialog 组件概述（Windows 窗体）

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可以指定要在 控件中显示的文件类型，该类型基于操作环境中使用的标准 `System` 文件属性。Use this property to specify the type of files to display in a control, based on standard `System` file attribute used in the operating environment. 在运行时设置此属性会将 控件重置为仅显示具有指定属性的文件。Setting this property at run time resets the control to display only those files that have the specified attribute. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不应为 控件设置此属性;提供此方法只是因为 控件继承自 。This property should not be set for the control; it is provided only because the control inherits from . [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]
